bit_field.name: HEADER
bit_field.description: CFPA Header marker should be set to 0x9635

bit_field.name: CMPA_UPD
bit_field.description: CMPA page updated through ROM API. Thus compute CMAC on sub-sequent boot. This field is checked only in OEM_OPEN (0x3) LC state.

bit_field_value.name: UPDATE_IN_CMPA
bit_field_value.description: Update CMAC field in CMPA page.

bit_field_value.name: TO_OEM_SECURE
bit_field_value.description: Update CMAC field in CMPA page and OTP. Advance OTP_LC_STATE to OEM_SECURE (0x7)

bit_field_value.name: TO_OEM_CLOSED
bit_field_value.description: Update CMAC field in CMPA page and OTP. Advance OTP_LC_STATE to OEM_CLOSED (0xF).

bit_field_value.name: TO_OEM_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Update CMAC field in CMPA page and OTP. Advance OTP_LC_STATE to OEM_LOCKED (0xCF).

bit_field.name: DICE_UPD
bit_field.description: Update DICE certificate during next boot.

bit_field.name: LP_VECTOR_ADDR
bit_field.description: Vector address when waking from power-down and deep power down states.

register.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_NS_PIN
register.description: Device Configuration Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Pinned

register.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_NS_DFLT
register.description: Device Configuration Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Debug Filter

bit_field.name: ME_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Flash Mass Erase Command Fixed State

register.name: MCTR_NPX_CTX0
register.description: Erase count for internal Prince region 0 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_NPX_CTX1
register.description: Erase count for internal Prince region 1 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_NPX_CTX2
register.description: Erase count for internal Prince region 2 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_NPX_CTX3
register.description: Erase count for internal Prince region 3 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX0
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 0 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX1
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 1 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX2
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 2 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX3
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 3 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX4
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 4 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX5
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 5 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX6
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 6 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MCTR_IPED_CTX7
register.description: Erase count for external Prince region 7 (Monotonic counter)

register.name: ERR_AUTH_FAIL_COUNT
register.description: Authentication failure counter during boot, SB3, debug authentication (Monotonic counter)

register.name: ERR_ITRC_COUNT
register.description: Tamper event counter (ITRC reset, WDT reset, WDT reset, GDET reset, Tamper pin) (Monotonic counter)

register.name: ERR_CFG_FAIL_COUNT
register.description: Configuration check failure counter during CMPA, CFPA, ROM patch, TRNG, PUF start (Monotonic counter)

register.name: MFLAG_CUST_0
register.description: Customer defined Monotonic flags 0 (once a bit is set the newer version of the page should have the flag set.)

register.name: IPED_GCM_AAD_CTX0
register.description: Additional Authentication Data for IPED context 0

bit_field.name: FIELD
bit_field.description: Additional Authentication Data for IPED context 0

register.description: Additional Authentication Data for IPED context 1
